### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler(position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Copper plate mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -82.0)
- Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a furnace at position (40.0, -79.0)
- Furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
- Furnace at position (42.0, -81.0)
- Furnace at position (45.0, -80.0)

### Iron ore mine at position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### Electricity distribution at position (various)
Consists of small electric poles at various positions, including (2.5, 1.5), (8.5, 9.5), (-3.5, 18.5), (-3.5, 22.5), and (4.5, 5.5)

### Water supply at position (-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5)) and connected pipes

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel before using them
- Monitor the fuel levels of burner entities to avoid running out of fuel

### Errors when using entities without input
- Ensure that entities have the required input before using them
- Monitor the input levels of entities to avoid running out of input

### Errors when placing entities without checking for collisions
- Ensure that the target tile is empty before placing an entity
- Check for collisions with other entities before placing a new entity

### Errors when using fluid systems without checking for connections
- Ensure that fluid systems are properly connected before using them
- Monitor the fluid levels and connections to avoid errors

### Errors when using electricity without checking for connections
- Ensure that electricity is properly connected before using it
- Monitor the voltage and connections to avoid errors
